devicedata.name: Generic TCP Tester
devicedata.creator: Control4

property.name: Server Address
property.description: This can be either a hostname or an IP address

property.name: Server Port
property.description: The port to connect to on the remote server. Some standard ports: HTTP 80, HTTPS 443 [Set Use SSL to Yes], TELNET 23

property.name: Connection Type
property.description: Which protocol to use (SSL only supports TCP)

property.name: Use SSL
property.description: Whether to use SSL on the connection

property.name: Open Connection
property.description: Set to Open to open the connection with the above settings

property.name: Send Data
property.description: Enter text to send to the remote server.\n is turned into a newline and \r is turned into a carriage return
